business_summary: Coca-Cola Bottlers Japan Holdings Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the purchases, sales, bottling, packaging, distribution and marketing of carbonated beverages, coffee beverages, tea-based beverages, mineral water, and other soft drinks in Japan. The company manufactures and sells food products; operates vending machines; distributes and sells alcoholic products; and manufactures, processes, and sells beverage products and office coffee services. In addition, it provides shared services to support the sales of nonessential, alcoholic, and dairy beverages, as well as food products; and imports, exports, and sells beverage products, nonessential beverage products, and other beverage products. The company offers its products under the Coca-Cola, Fanta, Sprite, Real Gold, Georgia, Aquarius, Qoo, Sokenbicha, Huang, and Kochakaden brand names. The company was formerly known as Coca-Cola Bottlers Japan Inc. and changed its name to Coca-Cola Bottlers Japan Holdings Inc. in January 2018. Coca-Cola Bottlers Japan Holdings Inc. was incorporated in 1960 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Hokkaido Coca-Cola Bottling Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells of beverages in Japan. It sells its products under the Coca Cola, FANTA, Sprite, I LOHAS, AQUARIUS, Qoo, Ayataka, Barley tea in a kettle, Black Tea Kaden, Georgia, Costa Coffee, Kira Fans, Sokenbi tea, Canda Dry, Real Gold, Body Healthy Tea, Jack Daniel's & Coca-Cola, and Lemon-do brands, and other limited edition brands, such as I LOHAS Haskap, Georgia Milk Coffee, Georgia banana milk coffee, Georgia Melon Milk Coffee, Georgia The Blend, and Georgia Santos Premium names. The company was incorporated in 1940 and is headquartered in Sapporo, Japan. Hokkaido Coca-Cola Bottling Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Dai Nippon Printing Co., Ltd.

TOBISHIMA HOLDINGS Inc. engages in the construction business in Japan and internationally. The company is involved in the research, survey, planning, drafting, designing, supervision, and operation of civil engineering, construction work and contracting, as well as regional development, urban and marine development, and environmental enhancement; mediation of corporate acquisitions, mergers, company splits, share exchanges and transfers, business transfers, capital alliances, and business alliances; computer-based information processing and hardware and software development; and mediation for the formulation of corporate management strategies, organizational and business restructuring, and corporate revitalization, as well as non-life insurance agency, insurance agency, and life insurance solicitation businesses. It also engages in housing, real estate transaction, and real estate leasing businesses; planning, drafting, designing, holding, maintenance, management, operation, and management of public facilities; supply of energy, such as electricity and heat; contract maintenance and management of buildings and facilities incidental to buildings; entrustment of security and security; acquisition, licensing, and sale of industrial property rights, copyrights, and know-how; planning, design, manufacture, and sale of plant factories; and research and development related to the production of agricultural, forestry, and fishery products. In addition, the company manufactures, procures, sells, and leases construction machinery and equipment, civil engineering, and construction-related materials; produces, processes, and sells agricultural, forestry, and fishery products; provides worker dispatching and fee-based employment brokerage services, consulting services; and engages in projects related to the remediation of environmental pollution. TOBISHIMA HOLDINGS Inc. was incorporated in 2024 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

business_summary: Ai Fusion Capital Group Corp.is principal investment firm specializing in companies that provide AI solutions and conventional venture investment. It is also engage in management and administration of the group companies that are in to Investment in venture companies and formation and administration of Investment Funds, and as well as all associated and related these businesses. Ai Fusion Capital Group Corp. was founded in October 1, 2024 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Yomeishu Seizo Co.,Ltd. produces and sells herbal liqueurs and pharmaceutical products in Japan, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Singapore, and Taiwan. It offers quasi-drugs comprising Yomeishu, a herbal liqueur; gummies and supplements, candies, black vinegar drinks, and home brewed mirins; sake comprising liquor, wine, and cocktails; and ginger black vinegar, black soyabean vinegar, and Amazake. The company offers its products through the mail order site www.yomeishu-online.jp. In addition, it operates CLASUWA, a restaurant; buys, sells, leases, and manages real estate properties; manages restaurants and shops; manufactures and sells alcoholic beverages; manufactures, sells, imports, and brokerages food products; consignment of analysis, consulting, and testing related to physics, chemistry, pharmacology, etc.; and generates, supplies, and sells electricity through natural energy, such as solar. Yomeishu Seizo Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1923 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

ETS Group Co.,Ltd engages in the electric power business in Japan and internationally. The company surveys, designs, and constructs overhead and underground transmission lines, substations, civil engineering, pipe, etc. It is also involved in electrical equipment construction, instrumentation equipment construction, information and communication equipment construction, and disaster prevention and crime prevention equipment construction activities, as well as design, construction, and maintenance management of energy-saving equipment construction, etc. In addition, it provides services, such as preservation, inspection, repair, maintenance planning, and administrative management of buildings and facilities, as well as the placement of cleaning staff and administrators, and various maintenance services. Further, the company offers support services for domestic and international companies. The company was founded in 1922 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

Oenon Holdings, Inc. engages in the development of alcoholic beverages, enzymes, pharmaceuticals, real estate, and other businesses based on biotechnologies derived from fermentation technologies in Japan. It operates through the Alcoholic Beverages, Enzymes and Pharmaceuticals, Real Estate, and Others segments. The company offers alcoholic beverages, including shochu, sake, plum wines/liqueurs, spirits, imported wines, and ready-to-drink alcoholic beverages, as well as alcoholic beverage ingredients, industrial alcohol, and seasonings. It also provides enzymes such as lactase, glucose isomerase, isoamylase, cellulase, and inulinase for food applications, as well as protease for food, research, and diagnostics. In addition, the company provides contract manufacturing services and engages in diagnostic medicines and outsourced fermentation businesses. Further, it is involved in the purchase, sale, and leasing of real estate, as well as warehousing and cargo handling activities. Oenon Holdings, Inc. was incorporated in 1920 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Takara Holdings Inc., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells alcoholic beverages and seasonings in Japan, the United States, and internationally. It operates through the Takara Shuzo, Takara Shuzo International Group, Takara Bio Group, and Other segments. The company offers alcoholic beverages, including shochu, sake, and light-alcohol refreshers; Scotch whisky, and alcohol-based seasonings, including Hon Mirin, food seasonings, and distilled raw alcohol, as well as engages in the sale of sundries, seafood, wine, bourbon whiskey, food ingredients, frozen food, and cookware and dinnerware for restaurants. It is also involved in the development, manufacture, and sale of reagents and instruments; contract development and manufacturing organization services for the development and manufacturing of regenerative medicine products; genetic analysis and testing; and genetic medicine and gene therapy. In addition, the company engages in the provision of logistics services, such as distribution processing and mail order/sales promotion distribution; transportation; warehousing; automobile services; non-life insurance agent; travel agent; wholesale of containers and packaging materials; digital; printing; and web production. Further, it offers market research; sales promotion planning; temporary staffing for plants, store support, and office and technical work; sale of rice, wheat, and food byproducts, as well as feed comprising rice bran and corn meal; and real estate leasing. The company exports its products. Takara Holdings Inc. was founded in 1842 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

business_summary: Wedge Co., Ltd. sells and rents intercoms, transceivers, and radio equipment. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquatered in Kyoto, Japan.

business_summary: Neuromagic Co.,Ltd. provides UI/UX and other design project solutions. It offers business design, design research, workshop facilitation, prototype/MVP development, social community design, sustainability transformation, customer journey mapping, and service design blueprinting; and sustainability strategy building and workshop, stakeholder and market research, system mapping, and global partnership solutions. The company also provides brand design services, including mission, vision and value development, organization and management, segmentation, targeting, positioning, brand strategy planning, visual identity creation and development, and formulation of brand voice; and communication design services, such as communication strategy and implementation, media planning and operation, PR/promotion planning, web development, web, event, and video and photo production. Neuromagic Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

business_summary: Shimadaya Corporation manufactures and sells noodles and related food products in Japan. The company offers udon, soba, ramen, frozen noodles, and fried noodles. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1931 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

Kirin Holdings Company, Limited engages in food and beverages, alcoholic beverages, pharmaceuticals, and health science businesses. Its products include beer, wine, soft drinks, dairy products, margarine, jams, and honey. The company engages in the management of a chain of Kirin City beer pubs. It also produces and sells pharmaceutical products. In addition, it manufactures and sells amino acids and nucleic acids for pharmaceutical and industrial use, as well as bulk pharmaceuticals, inspection machines, and cosmetics and health foods. Furthermore, it provides logistics, accounting, human resources, and real estate services. Additionally, the company is involved in the development of internal information systems and the manufacturing and sale of nutritional supplements. The company was formerly known as Kirin Brewery Company, Limited and changed its name to Kirin Holdings Company, Limited in July 2007. Kirin Holdings Company, Limited was founded in 1885 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Asahi Group Holdings, Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells beer, alcohol and non-alcohol beverages, and food products in Japan, Europe, Oceania, and Southeast Asia. The company offers alcoholic beverage products, including beers, non-alcohol beer, new genre, wines, shochu, whiskey and spirits, ready-to-drink beverages, and happoshu products. It also provides non-alcoholic beverage products beverages, such as carbonated drinks, coffee, tea, lactic acid bacteria drinks, and mineral water; and ciders. The company provides its products primarily under the Asahi Super Dry, Peroni Nastro Azzurro, Kozel, Pilsner Urquell, Grolsch, Great Northern, Victoria Bitter, Carlton Draught, Tyskie, Ursus, Radegast, London Pride, Asahi Nama Beer, Nikka, Asahi Zeitaku Shibori, Viper, Good Tides, Vodka Cruiser, Long White, Birell, Dry Zero, Great Northern Zero, Mitsuya, Wilkinson, Calpis, Wonda, Cool Ridge, Goodday, Mintia, Ippon Manzoku Bar, Dear-Natura, Amana Foods, and Wakodo brands. The company was formerly known as Asahi Breweries, Ltd. and changed its name to Asahi Group Holdings, Ltd. in July 2011. Asahi Group Holdings, Ltd. was founded in 1889 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Sapporo Holdings Limited engages in alcoholic beverages, foods and soft drinks, restaurants, and real estate businesses in Japan and internationally. It operates through three segments: Alcoholic Beverages, Food & Soft Drinks, and Real Estate. The company manufactures, sale, and markets beer, wine, other alcoholic beverages, and other food products; spices, herbs, and dehydrated vegetables; ice cream and soup. It is involved in operating restaurants, factories, and vending machines business; instore merchandising; provision of consigned freight forwarding, cargo handling and warehousing, and packaging and distribution processing. In addition, the company engages in leasing, management, and rental of real estate; and real estate development. It sells its products under the POKKA brands; and restaurants under the GINZA LION and YEBISU BAR name. The company was founded in 1876 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Human Adjust Co.,Ltd. engages in the management of acupuncture and bone setting clinics in Japan. It also provides acupuncture and bone setting clinic store management consulting services; and holds seminars for acupuncture and bone setting clinics. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shinjuku, Japan.

Nihonwasou Holdings, Inc. engages in the sales intermediation of Japanese clothing and accessories. The company provides educational guidance for kimono and sewing; tailoring and sewing of kimonos; Kimono maintenance and sales promotion agency services; and production management consulting services, as well as is involved in a wholesale business of Japanese clothing and accessories. It also researches, develops, and sells kimono accessories; manufactures and sells textiles; and operates the men's Kimono specialty stores. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Oriental Consultants Holdings Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides infrastructure management services in Japan and internationally. The company offers intellectual services, such as research, planning, design, investigation, evaluation, guidance, maintenance, operation management, etc. related to water supply wastewater, waste, environment, and information, as well as construction supervision/GIS, spatial information, surveying/measurement, traffic observation/analysis, information processing, and equipment sales/rental. It also provides environmental management services, which include geological/soil survey, environmental remediation, structural survey/renewal, hydraulic analysis, drilling work, demolition work, hot spring construction, residential land, construction transactions, etc. In addition, the company engages in the software sales and development, real estate rental businesses, etc. Further, it offers construction management, measurement control, and asset management services; various IT solutions; and human resources and business process outsourcing, management, temporary, staffing, etc. The company was formerly known as ACKG Limited and changed its name to Oriental Consultants Holdings Company Limited in December 2018. Oriental Consultants Holdings Company Limited was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

UNITED, Inc. engages in the ad-technology, content, and investment businesses in Japan. It offers Bypass, an Ad distribution platform for agencies and advertisers; adstir, Ad management platform for publishers; Crash Fever, a role-playing game; and CocoPPa Play, a dress-up avatar service. The company also operates CHEERZ, a service to help invigorate artists' activities; plans, develops, and operates TechAcademy, a Japan's online programming school; produces sports-related websites; plans and develops media; plans and operates Dream Mail, a sweepstakes and gift site; and provides consulting solutions to support the digital transformation of companies, as well as develops various applications. In addition, it is involved in the venture capital investment business. UNITED, Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

E-SUPPORTLINK, Ltd. provides fresh fruit and vegetable distribution solutions. The company's products include e Support link system for managing distribution information between different companies and departments that make up the supply chain online; Fresh MD system, a cloud service for ordering and payment of perishable products; farm story that provides IT solution for creating valuable agriculture; pesticide search system, which develop pest and weed control guidelines; business outsourcing services for distribution of perishable products; support for the construction of fruit and vegetable sales floors; local vegetable procurement support service; and inventory management system that responds to the customs of the fruit and vegetable industry. The company provides its services to producers/agricultural cooperatives, government, fresh food distribution industries, and retail/mass retailers. E-SUPPORTLINK, Ltd. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Infomart Corporation operates an online business-to-business (BtoB) electronic commerce platform in Japan. The company operates in BtoB-PF FOOD business and BtoB-PFES business segments. The company offers BtoB Platform Invoices that digitizes the billing process; BtoB Platform Ordering for receiving and ordering operations; BtoB platform TRADE to manage quotation, ordering, receiving, delivery, inspection, and billing operations digitally; BtoB Platform Ordering Lite for managing Order information from faxes, telephone calls, emails, etc. on the cloud; BtoB Platform Contract, a secure electronic contract service; TANOMU, a wholesale ordering system; and BP Storage for Invoices to automate invoice input and payment/accounting tasks. It also provides BtoB Platform Negotiations for Matching sellers, food wholesalers, restaurants, and other businesses with buyers; V-Manage to visualize and automates store operations; BtoB Platform Specification, a cloud service for creating and delivering specifications and ingredient labels; AI-OCR (invox), an AI OCR processes and digitizes faxes, emails, and PDF purchase orders; BP Workflow to digitizing internal approval and application procedures; Electronic Bill Early Payment that Converts invoices waiting for payment into cash; BtoB Platform Quotation which Centralized management of quotes online; and BtoB eSmart, a commercial mail order site. Infomart Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

ValueCommerce Co., Ltd. provides marketing solutions in Japan. It operates through two segments, Customer Solutions Business and EC Solutions Business. The company offers Affiliate, a performance-based advertising services; Value Commerce Affiliate, a tracking system and an online trading platform; StoreMatch, a pay-per click advertisement for online mall stores for cars; STORE's R8, a CRM tool for online mall stores; and B-Space, an EC site management and support solution. It provides monicam and Cast book, an influencer marketing solution; and VLINK, a social commerce platform, as well as engages in the traveltec business for accommodation facilities. In addition, it offers consulting services that include planning, operation, and management of advertising methods, and optional services for advertisers. The company was formerly known as Transpacific Inc. and changed its name to ValueCommerce Co., Ltd. in November 1999. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. ValueCommerce Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Z Holdings Corporation.

KIDS STAR Inc. plans, develops, and operates educational apps primarily for pre and elementary school children in Japan. The company offers Gokko Land, an educational app that teaches about the workings of society through hands-on content, as well as for businesses and local governments. Its educational apps include Pretend Land, a social experience app; Moving Land, an AR exercise game; Ugokko Land Sports, an AR exercise game; and Gokko Land Sports, a sports app. The company also provides app content contract development and business development support and service design services. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

Adways Inc. engages in ad platform, agency, and other businesses in Japan, China, Korea, Taiwan, the Philippines, Hong Kong, Singapore, and the United States. The company offers MediaAnalyzer for media analysis and trend cause-and-effect visioning; VIDEO ANALYZER for video viewership analysis; MarketingDashboard for market data analysis; DeliverySimulator for delivery simulation; X for cross-sectional media monitoring; Best Practice Checker for delivery optimization management; STROBELIGHTS, a media operations support; Infinity Expansion for infinitely extended logic targeting; CREATIVE LAB., a creative management tool; CreativeAnalyzer for creative effectiveness analysis; Dobel for automatic generation of video creatives; massive, used for automatic generation of still-image creatives; and MARKETING DOC, a Vital sign measurement service. It also provides Unicorn, an automated marketing platform that enables machine learning and future predictions; JANet, an affiliate service in the web domain; Smart-C, an affiliate service in the app domain; and AppDriver, an offerwall service. In addition, the company offers Old Rookie Sauna that operates on a membership, invitation, reservation, and subscription basis; and SPOT, a media services that delivers information on going out and travelling by gathering sightseeing information based on locals, as well as a pre-registration platform for mobile apps. Further, it provides services for digitalization of companies comprising media development, management, and outsourcing; SaaS agency; and advertising, PR, and branding services. The company also engages in the provision of advertising management services; marketing strategy planning; service development and UI / UX design; business strategy planning; administration and management; business partnership; and financing support services. Adways Inc. was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

JTP Co.,Ltd. provides outsourced technical services to technology companies in Japan. The company offers integration services, including consultation, system design and integration, system development, operation and maintenance, training program for users, helpdesk, and supply chain management for users. It also provides training services, such as delivering training programs, preparing and cultivating training staff, promoting training programs, rental lesson venues, and localizing course materials. In addition, the company offers medical devices support services comprising medical device repairs and maintenance, substitute device, sales support, technological implementation support, and help desk; and analytical instruments solutions, which consists of technical support on delivery, maintenance, help desk, equipment and software localization, and lab management system. Further, it engages in the development of custom application; sale and rental of robots; importing and localization; and provision of robotics business consulting, and technical support services. Additionally, the company provides digital marketing services; and GAIT for IT skill assessments. The company was formerly known as Japan Third Party Co., Ltd. and changed its name to JTP Co.,Ltd. in April 2021. JTP Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Tear Corporation provides funeral services in Japan. It operates funeral hall primarily in Chubu, Kansai, and Kanto districts. The company also accepts funerals and legal services at temples, private homes, and public places, as well as follow-ups according to the consultation content of the bereaved families. Tear Corporation was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

Demae-Can Co.,Ltd operates delivery-specialized websites and apps in Japan. The company operates Demae-kan, a delivery service offering various restaurants, beverages, alcohol, and daily necessities; and Yahoo! Quick Mart, a service that delivers daily necessities. It offers Demaekan eGift, a gift certificate for dishes, foods, and everyday items. The company was formerly known as Yume no Machi Souzou Iinkai Co., Ltd. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Shibuya, Japan.

Honyaku Center Inc. provides translation services in Japan and internationally. It offers translation for patent documents comprising application-related, court-related, and others; and medical documents, including basic research/non-clinical development, clinical development, regulatory submission, and post-marketing. The company also provides financial and legal translations comprising finance, legal, disclosure and related documents, and corporate and other documents; and translation services for IT related documents and manuals documents. In addition, it offers translation of industrial documents, such as R&D, planning, and design documents; production, quality assurance, implementation, and maintenance service documents; sales and marketing documents; and non-manufacturing industry related documents. Further, the company provides medical writing, grammar check, transcription, staffing, multilingual contact center, proofreading and back translation, and foreign patent application services, as well as services related to computer games, e-learning, and Websites; and prepares drawings. Additionally, it offers translation services for documents required to apply for marriage, work, residency, study abroad, and other visas; and DTP, printing, document, and e-book translation related services, as well as pamphlets and catalogues, press releases and newsletters, and presentation documents. The company serves clients in a range of industries, such as auto, mechanical, electronics, pharma, patent, law, finance, R&D, education, and other fields. Honyaku Center Inc. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Townnews-Sha Co.,Ltd. engages in the publishing business in Japan. It issues Town News, a local information paper. The company is also involved in the planning, production, and printing of various printed materials, such as postcards, business cards, and shop menu; and offers advertisement placement services. In addition, it publishes commemorative magazines and guidebooks; and plans and operates Websites, which include Political village, a database site introducing all politicians in Kanagawa prefecture and Rare A, a community-based event information site. Townnews-Sha Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

System Location Co.,Ltd. provides business support solutions for finance companies in Japan and internationally. The company offers solutions for auto lease, new car sales support, and collective evaluation for present value. It also provides SYSROCKET, an ASP solution package; CA Doctor, a sales support system for new car dealers; CAV Monitor, a solution that provides lump calculation of quantity of car asset value; RV Doctor, a residual value setting system; and PV Doctor, a residual value setting system. In addition, the company is involved in the business solutions for automobile dealers; general planning, design, development, operation, and maintenance services for IT systems; business support for automobile finance; automotive content development business; and system service business for automobile related businesses. The company was formerly known as Dormant Company Pine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to System Location Co.,Ltd. in July 1992. System Location Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1968 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

Ai Robotics Inc. engages in the plan, development, and sale of skincare products, beauty appliances, and other products using AI. It also provides AI marketing services. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

JTEC Corporation engages in technical staff intellectual property leasing business for engineers in Japan and internationally. It dispatches engineers for various fields, such as mechanical design, electrical and electronic design, software development, and architectural design through through temporary staffing and outsourcing contracts; and offers technical dispatch to development sites and manufacturing sites, as well as engages in the human resource business, nursing care business, event business, and posting business. The company also offers paid employment placement, various technical services, technical education, and consulting services. The company was formerly known as J-Tech Corporation and changed its name to JTEC Corporation in August 1999. JTEC Corporation was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Chuo, Japan.

Temairazu, Inc. engages in the development, operation, and provision of comparison website in Japan. It offers Channel Manager TEMAIRAZU, an online system that allows customers to centrally manage various accommodation reservation sites; and Hikaku.com, a site that compares the prices of various e-commerce sites. The company was formerly known as Hikaku.com Corporation and changed its name to Temairazu, Inc. in October 2017. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

WDB Holdings Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides human resources services in Japan and internationally. It operates through Human Resources Services Business and Contract Research Organization (CRO) Business segments. The company offers registered and permanent temporary staffing, placement, and recruitment services for scientific researchers, engineering engineers, and general clerical staff. It serves customers in the research and development, and quality control departments in the pharmaceutical, food, chemical, and other manufacturing industries; laboratories of public institutions and universities; machinery design, electrical and electronic equipment design, software development, and inspection divisions in the electrical, electronics, and precision machinery manufacturing industry; and other various industries. The company also provides doconico, a staffing service platform; and doco1, a system for managing staffing operations across multiple agencies, including order placement, contracts, attendance tracking, and invoicing on one platform. In addition, it offers agency services and support for the development of pharmaceuticals, quasi-drugs, cosmetics, and medical devices. Further, it engages in the provision of merger and acquisition, and business revitalization support in the fields of pharmaceuticals, chemistry, foodstuff, and engineering; and promotion of employment of persons with disabilities through data entry processing and cleaning work, etc. WDB Holdings Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Kobe, Japan.

S-Pool, Inc. provides human resources and business solutions in Japan. The company offers temporary staffing services primarily focusing on operations that require communication skills. It also provides special needs employment services; administrative BPO services; business succession support services; environmental management support services; decarbonization support services; employment and sales support services; logistics outsourcing services; cross-boded e-commerce services; professional human resources utilization services; and sustainability training video services. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
ASUA Inc. offers consulting servies for logistics, communications, and IoT. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nagoya, Japan.

Hibino Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, designs, sells, installs, and maintains audio equipment in Japan and internationally. The company also imports, sells, and designs sound system equipment; designs and installs architectural acoustics; develops, manufactures, and sells acoustic products; and provides sound and vibration, survey, and measurement consulting services. In addition, it plans, operates, and rents audio and video systems for concerts and events; dispatches operators and engineers related to audio and video equipment and systems; designs, sells, installs, and maintains lighting equipment for business use; and designs and installs industrial noise countermeasures. Further, the company develops, manufactures, and sells industrial noise control products; operates a live house under the Kennedy House Ginza name and a live music club; and sells LED displays and peripheral equipment. It primarily serves professionals and consumers, as well as movie theaters and halls. The company was formerly known as Hibino Electro Sound Inc. and changed its name to Hibino Corporation. Hibino Corporation was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Aoba-BBT, Inc. operates in the educational business in Japan. The company is involved in the distance education business; group education business; international school management; content provider business; and planning and production of business and management specialized content. It also operates as a distance learning system consultant and service provider, as well as business breakthrough university management and graduate school management. The company was formerly known as Business Breakthrough, Inc. and changed its name to Aoba-BBT, Inc. in October 2023. Aoba-BBT, Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

LIKE, Inc. offers a range of human resource services in Japan. The company's services include temporary staffing, outsourcing, recruitment, and educational support; and outsourced and public childcare services. It also operates nursing homes that offer nursing care related services. The company was formerly known as J-COM Holdings Co., Ltd. and changed its name to LIKE, Inc. in December 2016. LIKE, Inc. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

FAN Communications, Inc. develops Internet advertising related businesses in Japan. It operates through two segments, CPA Solutions Business and AD Communication Business. The company offers affiliate advertising through A8.net, an affiliate service provider for PCs, smartphones, and tablets. It also offers Dpoint MARKET, an online shopping services that allows users to earn d-points for online shopping; GERA, A subscription podcast app for Japanese comedians; Linkhere, a link summary tool for each social networking post; YOOR, an online salon platform for community, fan clubs, and online lessons; Triggerr, a profile curation service for athletes; and N-INE FORM, a marketing tool that enables measurement of official LINE accounts. In addition, the company provides nend operation, a programmatic advertising service for smartphones; and seedApp, a cost per install advertising service for smartphone apps, as well as manages of business media, etc. FAN Communications, Inc. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Shibuya-ku, Japan.
INGS inc. operates restaurants under the Ramen Hayashida, CONA, and Shumai no Joe names in Japan. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

AUN CONSULTING, Inc. provides marketing support services in Japan and internationally. The company offers search engine optimization consulting and paid search advertising services. It also provides various services that support corporate marketing activities, such as search engine marketing, Internet advertisement, advertisement production, website development, and social media services. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

All About, Inc. engages in the internet advertising business in Japan. It is also involved in the portal site operation, sampling, and learning businesses. In addition, the company engages in the operation of Facebook navi, a social media related business; citrus, a distributed media platform; and Twin Navi, a Twitter navigation site. All About, Inc. was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Growth X Partners,Inc. engages in the digital transformation consultation and support business for enterprises. It is involved in the DX promotion support business, including DX support consulting, system planning, development, and operation activities for customers; and DX support product/service and digital service co-creation businesses. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

PRAP Japan, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a public relations consultancy company in Japan. It provides communication; digital solution; and media training and crisis management services. PRAP Japan, Inc. was incorporated in 1970 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

Takamiya Co., Ltd. operates temporary equipment rental business in Japan and internationally. It also engages in housing, structural, and environmental equipment business and provides disaster prevention and soundproofing goods. The company offers temporary equipment, which include YT lock system that can be erected along slopes, as well as used as a gantry; IQ system, a next-generation scaffolding system with high safety at large working space; clamps, a bolted fastening-type metal fittings parts of temporary equipment; and G Walk, a catwalk panel with fewer gaps to prevent stumbling and falling objects. It also provides dimple post X, which protects the safety and lives of workers while they are under the beams for work, including steel construction and ridge beam operations; spider panel, a panel-type hanging scaffolding that minimizes gaps, unevenness, and improves safety and workability; standing bear that enables safe assembly and disassembly; power frame, a wedge-type support system that fits the shape of a structure flexibly; lift climber, a mechanical scaffold for skyscrapers; and AL-speeder. In addition, the company provides environment equipment, such as tiger dam, a water bag for inundation measures replacing the sandbags; building material; and agricultural materials, such as steel frame house pro II and weather resistant pipe house; and stainless steel column formworks. Takamiya Co., Ltd. was formerly known as SRG Takamiya Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Takamiya Co., Ltd. in April 2019. The company was incorporated in 1969 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Gurunavi, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, offers web-based information services related to restaurants through PC and smartphones in Japan. The company also offers Internet-based PR and marketing support services to restaurants in China. In addition, it provides administrative outsourcing services and welfare services; food-related research and information services; and management, planning, operation, and administration of restaurants. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
Tops Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells fiber reinforced plastic products (FRP) for automobiles in Japan. The company is headquartered in Yamato, Japan.

Asukanet Co., Ltd. engages in the funeral, photo book, and aerial display businesses in Japan. It creates and sells photo books that support small lots from one book by on-demand printing, as well as develops related software; produces funeral photographs for funeral companies and homes; and provides aerial display related services. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Hiroshima, Japan.

Shinwa Wise Holdings Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an auction company in Japan. The company operates an art dealing and gallery management business; sells asset defense diamonds; microfinance; medical and cultural support; and real estate business. It also sells electricity, as well as involved in solar power generation facilities business. The company was formerly known as Shinwa Art Auction Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Shinwa Wise Holdings Co.,Ltd. in December 2017. Shinwa Wise Holdings Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Chuo, Japan.

Kyodo Public Relations Co., Ltd. operates as an integrated communications and public relations agency in Japan and internationally. The company offers media relations, strategy, public relations, crisis and risk management, public affairs, and digital marketing services. Kyodo Public Relations Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1964 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

CEDAR.Co.,Ltd. provides nursing care and rehabilitation services in Japan. It offers day care, resident life care, home-visit nursing care, home help, home care support, group home, and short-term residency care services. CEDAR.Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Kitakyushu, Japan.

Hakuhodo DY Holdings Inc. provides marketing and communications services in Japan and internationally. The company engages in the advertising and digital marketing business; and planning, production, buying, and media traffic in media and contents businesses, as well as provision of marketing solutions for advertisers, media companies, and content holders. It also provides brand building services; and specializes in business development in the entertainment field, including animated programs and live events. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

DeNA Co., Ltd. develops and operates mobile and online services worldwide. It operates Mobage, an entertainment platform; Yahoo! Mobage, which offers social games for PC browsers; AndApp, a platform that allows users to play mobile game apps on PC browsers under the same user account; Pococha, a social live streaming community; and IRIAM, an app which allows to livestream as an anime character. The company also operates SHOWROOM, a virtual stage where fans can watch their artists perform live while interacting with them in real time; kencom, which supports health insurance societies to manage their members' health data; and ONSEI, an app that uses AI to check for changes in cognitive function. In addition, it operates MENKYO, which enables cognitive function test for elderly drivers seeking license renewal; MOGI, a cognitive function test similar to MENKYO; SHINRI-ADAS, a cognitive functional test; MRI-TAISEKI, a system that analyses brain DICOM images; Join, a communication app; Team, connects medical and healthcare services and supports multi-professional collaboration; JoinTriage, and EMS triage app; Join Mobile Clinic, an integrated telemedicine support solution; Enroll, a patient recruitment solution; MySOS, a life-saving and health support app with health and medical record for the user and their family; and DENA SPORTS GROUP, Yokohama DeNA Baystars, Kawasaki Brave Thunders, S.C.SAGAMIHARA, and DeNA Athletics Elite sports teams. Further, the company operates SOMPO DE NORU, a car leasing service; GO, a taxi dispatch app; DRIVE CHART, an accident reduction support service; anone, a communication service for seniors; dot-i, a security system; Virtual KEIBI System, a 3D character displayed on a mirror display could perform security monitoring and reception; Manga Box, a weekly manga magazine app; PICKFIVE, a NFT card game; and NFT collections. DeNA Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

World Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in human resources and education, information and telecommunications, real estate, and agricultural park businesses in Japan. The company offers subcontracting and outsourcing; temporary staffing services; research and development, and manufacturing technology, software, and system designs; construction engineering; repair of digital equipment; clinical research outsourcing services; logistics; and sales activities involving direct customer interaction, tourism, and call centers. It sells condominiums and residential building sites; condominium and building management; renovations, real estate brokerage services, and rental property management; and manufacture/sale/rental of prefabricated houses. In addition, the company is involved in operation of mobile phone store and call center; provision of solutions for corporate clients; management and operation of agricultural parks. The company was formerly known as World Intec Co., Ltd. and changed its name to World Holdings Co., Ltd. in July 2014. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Fukuoka City, Japan.

Wellnet Corporation provides payment settlement, electronic billing, and electronic payment services in Japan. The company also develops and provides mobile authentication solutions, as well as offers multi payment and remittance services. In addition, it provides payment secretary, a smartphone app for making payments directly from bank account; Bus Mori!, a service to buy highway bus tickets; and Bus Mori! MONTA, a real-time seat reservation management system for bus operators. Wellnet Corporation was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Care Service Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides in-home care support and day services in Japan and internationally. It provides visiting bath, home visit care, home visit nursing care, elderly facility, clean, and angel care services, as well as small scale and multifunctional in-home care services. The company also engages in the rental and sale of assistive equipment. In addition, it provides nursing care seminars, human resources and staffing agency, and worker dispatching services, as well as operates a care workers training school. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Brass Corporation engages in planning and operates wedding ceremonies and receptions at guesthouses in Japan. It also engages in the sale and rental of wedding costumes. In addition, the company produces and operates resort weddings and overseas photo weddings, as well as operates restaurant business, such as a steak restaurant and patisserie. Further, it offers lessons at training school in regard with weddings and receptions. Brass Corporation was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

ROXX,inc. develops and operates job change support platforms in Japan. It operates Z Career Platform, a job-changing platform; and back check, an online reference/compliance check platform. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

TSUKADA GLOBAL HOLDINGS Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the planning, development, and ownership of guest houses, hotels, and restaurants in Japan and internationally. It operates through three segments: Wedding Business, Hotel Business, and Wellness and Relaxation Business. The company plans, operates, and provides wedding, banquet, and accommodation services, as well as guest house, hotel, resort, and photo wedding services; and operates The Strings Hotel Nagoya and Kimpton Shinjuku Tokyo lifestyle hotel bearing brands. It also manages and operates hotels and restaurants under the Hotel InterContinental Tokyo Bay, The Strings Hotel Tokyo InterContinental, and The Strings Hotel Tokyo Bay names; operates reflexology salons under the Queensway name; hot spring facility under Miraku Onsen SPA-HERBS name; and fitness club under the BEST STYLE name, as well as fitness clubs under the FITNESS name. In addition, the company provides food and beverages and services for wedding receptions, wedding costume rentals and beauty services, such as hair and make-up and bridal beauty care, wedding production, photography and video, flower decoration, MC, sound, and other services; and operates local wedding facilities in Hawaii and Bali, as well as wedding ceremonies and receptions. Further, the company engages in the provision of planning and development services that include hotel management and business outsourcing and consulting services. The company was formerly known as Best Bridal Inc. and changed its name to TSUKADA GLOBAL HOLDINGS Inc. in July 2014. TSUKADA GLOBAL HOLDINGS Inc. was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

Human Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the human resource, education, nursing care, and other businesses in Japan and internationally. It offers various human resource services, such as staffing, recruitment, business consignment, job information services using internet, RPA introduction, outsourcing, and system development services. The company also provides education services, including school lectures and e-learning for infants, children, vocational schools, and recurrent; study abroad, nursery school management, training, translation, and interpretation services; nursing care services, such as day service, in-home care support, home-visit care, group home, small-scale multi-functional home care, and fee-based nursing home services with nursing care; nursing care facility management and nursing care education services; and operates a nail salon and sells related products. In addition, it manages a professional basketball team Osaka Evessa, as well as manages professional e-sports team Human Academy CREST GAMING; and provides IT solutions, including system development and operation, planning and production, and digital marketing. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

M3, Inc. provides medical-related services to physicians and other healthcare professionals through the internet. It operates m3.com, a members-only website for providing information, tools, and services for medical professionals; MR-kun which delivers the latest medical information for daily medical practice; QOL-kun, a marketing support service that provides selected information useful for doctors; m3.com CAREER, a physician recruitment and career change support site; and Drug Carrier, a job information site for pharmacists. The company also provides online lectures; clinical trial; research targeting domestic medical professionals; medical-related self-planned data and research reports; global health professional research; survey panel provision services; and m3.com opening and management services. In addition, it offers AskDoctors, where registered doctors answer questions about health and illness from the public; MDLinx for medical professionals in the United States; and Doctors.net.uk, a website that provides services for pharmaceutical companies; and drug information database. Further, the company is involved in the sales activities and marketing operations for pharmaceuticals and medical devices; development, sale, and support business of electronic medical records and medical equipment for medical institutions; Support for recruiting subjects necessary for clinical development and clinical research, and related tasks; provision of management support to medical institutions, as well as visiting nursing, day care, and home care support services; and operates podiatry and venous disease clinics, and hospice facilities. Additionally, it offers clinical and medico-political news and education for medical professionals. The company was formerly known as So-netM3, Inc. and changed its name to M3, Inc. in January 2010. M3, Inc. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Gendai Agency Inc. engages in planning and production of advertising and promotion services in Japan. The company provides advertising services, online and mass media advertising, newspaper flyers, and sales promotions. Its services include video and web content production; and research and development. The company also engages in the planning and management of store events; and real estate activities. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Career Design Center Co., Ltd. provides human resource services in Japan. The company involved in operation of career change websites; hosting job fair; recruiting agency business; Shukatsu, a service that supports job hunting through magazines, events, informative websites, and placement services; corporate recruiting activities through an outsourcing business that handles the creation of pamphlets, promotional items, and recruiting website; temporary staffing service for IT industry; and planning, editing, and management of web magazines engineer type, woman type, and 20's type. It also offers type, a career change site for people aiming for the next level; Women's Job Change type, a job change site for women who want to work as full-time employees for a long time; Direct type, a job change app that allows companies to approach job seekers directly; type engineer job change fair; job change type event for women; type job change agent, a human resource introduction and job change agency; typeIT dispatch, a staffing service for IT industry; type job hunting agent, a job hunting for the future as a professional; and type job hunting, a career research site. Career Design Center Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

KG Intelligence CO., LTD. operates as a content provider company. The company operates e-arpa, a recruiting site; Alpa Connect, a tool that manage and operate postings on e-alpa and aggregate sites; Alpa, a recruitment information magazine; ARPA presents suitable job fair; Orikomi Arpa, a newspaper insert recruitment paper; Rental Style, a website that provides rental information for rental apartments, condominiums, and detached houses; Step House.jp Custom House, a site for order house information; and Step House.jp Reform, a remodeling information site. It also provides career consultation, employment support, and career change support services; house building school services; Okinawa Wedding Online, a photo wedding site; Tokyo Wedding Online, a pre-shooting and photo wedding special site; and Leisure Fishing the Net, a site that introduces sea fishing information. In addition, the company operates Drive Pilgrimage, a guidebook for car pilgrimages; KG Concierge services; Niwa.pro, a professional gardener's group that helps to solve all garden problems; and Issai Gassai, a website creation service. Further, it offers recruiting and training human resources; and a range of printing and binding services, such as posters, flyers, pamphlets, and free papers. The company was incorporated in 1950 and is headquartered in Okayama, Japan.

Tetsujin Holdings, Inc. engages karaoke, media, alliance, restaurant, beauty, and other businesses in Japan. It offers karaoke distribution systems; mobile content, such as ringtones, ring melodies, lyrics, and deco-mail; operates an android dictionary, a curation site that features articles for Android users; and content collaboration and in-store media products. The company also operates restaurants; nail, eyelash extension, eyebrow, and head spa salons; and manages and operates real estate facilities. The company was formerly known as TETSUJIN Inc. and changed its name to TETSUJIN Holdings, Inc. in February 2024. TETSUJIN Holdings, Inc. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Balleggs Co.,Ltd. engages in the real estate brokerage business in Japan. It is also involved in the property management, real estate purchase and sales brokerage, and housing purchase and resale activities. In addition, the company engages in the development and subdivision, and renovating and new housing construction businesses. Balleggs Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Shin Nippon Biomedical Laboratories, Ltd., a contract research organization, engages in the pharmaceutical development, transactional research, and medipolis businesses in Japan and internationally. It offers non-clinical testing and non-clinical regulatory consulting for the development of pharmaceuticals, medical devices, or regenerative medicine products, including safety and pharmacology testing, and pharmacokinetic studies. The company also engages in licensing activities for proprietary products which utilize unique intranasal formulation delivery technology, discovery of future seeds, and business promotion activities; and development of artificial seed production for Japanese eels. In addition, it operates hotels accommodations facilities under the Villa Amafuru Oka and HOTEL Freesia names; and develops and operates geothermal and hot spring thermal power plants. Shin Nippon Biomedical Laboratories, Ltd. was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Kagoshima, Japan.

Nippon Care Supply Co., Ltd. engages in the rental and wholesale of welfare equipment businesses in Japan. The company rents or sells welfare equipment, including electric beds, wheelchairs, and bathing aids. The company also offers nursing care and diaper delivery services, as well as meal services for nursing care providers. Nippon Care Supply Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Minato, Japan.

Planet, Inc. provides electronic data interchange (EDI) services in Japan. It engages in the standardization of data interchange among companies for ordering, shipping, billing, and payment transactions. The company offers Basic EDI, a service that supports the transactions between manufacturers and wholesalers; MITEOS, a system that can process orders and creates and sends purchasing information on a web browser between wholesalers and its partner manufacturers; Web ordering, a service that supports EDI between Planet participating manufacturers and wholesalers; Sales report service in which Planet receives sales data sent from wholesalers to manufacturers; Material EDI, a solution between consumer goods manufacturers and material suppliers. It also provides Business Partner Database that provides standard business partner code information, used to specify delivery destinations for EDI services; and Product Database, a service that offers product information, such as cosmetics, pet food and supplies, OTC medicines, and other products. In addition, the company offers Buyers' Net, an information service that supports businesses merchandising operations between manufacturers, wholesalers, and retailers. Planet, Inc. was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

business_summary: Digital Holdings, Inc. provides advertising agency services in Japan and internationally. It offers and human resources support services. The company was formerly known as OPT Holding, Inc. and changed its name to Digital Holdings, Inc. in July 2020. Digital Holdings, Inc. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Wedge Holdings CO.,LTD., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the finance and content businesses in Japan and South-East Asia. The company offers financing services for the purchase of motorcycles. It also engages in the publication editing activities; planning and development of card games; and production and distribution of company owned contents and music labels. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Wedge Holdings CO.,LTD. operates as a subsidiary of Showa Holdings Co., Ltd.

Soiken Holdings Inc. engages in the development of biomarkers in Japan. The company is involved in the development and sale of cosmetics and dietary supplements comprising imidapeptides; licensing and development of biomarker technology; provision of marketing research and post-marketing surveys for dietary supplements; and research, development, and sale of functional materials, such as lactoferrin, as well as pharmaceutical products from ascochlorin derivatives. It also provides clinical evaluation tests for foodstuffs using biomarker technology; support for pharmaceutical clinical research and epidemiology studies; and services to health insurance societies, including contracted health guidance, specific health checkup promotion services for the dependents of insured, and service to prevent diabetes. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Toyonaka, Japan.

SBS Holdings, Inc. provides logistics services in Japan and internationally. It engages in general logistics business, including truck transportation, rail transportation, low temperature logistics, logistics center operation, international logistics, distribution processing, same-day delivery for corporations, home delivery, company and individual relocation, on-site logistics, and 3PL consulting services. The company is involved in logistic support business, such as marketing business, pet wellness business, insurance and leasing, environmental business, and personnel support/human resource services. In addition, it offers property management services comprising rent and development business. The company was formerly known as SBS Co., Ltd. and changed its name to SBS Holdings, Inc. in April 2006. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

business_summary: DIP Corporation engages in the human resources service business in Japan. The company offers dip AI, a dialogue-based part-time job search service; Baitoru talk, a communication app for store managers and part-time employees; Baitoru, a portal website for part time employees; Spot Baitoru, a job matching service that connects people who want to work in their spare time with establishments looking for workers; Baitoru NEXT, a job information website for those who are looking to work as regular or contract employees; Baitoru PRO, a job information site for specialized jobs; Hatarako net, a portal website connecting companies with those seeking regular, dispatched or part-time employment; Nurse de Hatarako, a job agency website for nurses; and Kaigo de Hatarako, a job agency website for care worker. It also provides Interview KOBOT, which handles accepting applications, and setting interview dates and times on behalf of the hiring manager; Personnel Administration KOBOT, a digital labor force that automates routine task; Corporate Recruiting Page KOBOT, a staff recruitment page for each client; HR KOBOT for Application Support; HR KOBOT which provides application support; Patronage KOBOT, a digital membership card service to attract regular customers with LINE Mini Apps; MEO KOBOT, a service to rank higher in map searches and boost customer acquisition; Baitoru magazine, an information platform that for finding part-time jobs and changing careers; Hatarako magazine, an information source for finding new working styles; AINOW, an AI-specialized media; dip Research Institute; and dip people. DIP Corporation was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Renaissance,Incorporated engages in sports club business in Japan. It operates fitness clubs, swimming schools, tennis schools, golf schools, etc. The company also provides health promotional services for local municipalities; nursing care and rehabilitation support services; and store development support services. In addition, it promotes Synapsology, a brain activation method; and offers support services for health education. Renaissance,Incorporated was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Scinex Corporation engages in media, ICT solution, logistics, and healthcare businesses in Japan and internationally. The company publishes my town encyclopedia and telepal 50; and convenience book, child rearing guide, health information, and city information guides. It also provides ICT solutions, such as CityDO!, a local information site; hometown tax payment site; local video portal site; My Town Tokusan Net, an e-commerce site; tours on the internet; B2B portal site for restaurant; my town artificial intelligence chatbot; Sirel, a marketplace that connects local companies and stores; a cloud based CMS for administrative purpose; My town app; My town customer app; My town NAVI; and digital signage solutions. In addition, it offers DM delivery and posting services. Scinex Corporation was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Chiyoda, Japan.

GiG Works Inc. provides marketing and communication, field support, and contact center services in Japan. It offers sales agency and sales support services; installation, replacement, and maintenance support services; call center operation and staff support service; and systems engineering development contract services. The company is also involved in the software development; planning, development, and sales of software packages; real estate services; office rental; and consulting services. In addition, it offers WEB3 services, such as development and operation of applications that utilize blockchain technology; and mail order and e-commerce services. The company was formerly known as ThreePro Group Inc. and changed its name to GiG Works Inc. in August 2019. The company was incorporated in 1977 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Saint-Care Holding Corporation provides healthcare services in Japan. The company offers visiting care and nursing, visit bathing, short-stay daily-life care, small-scale and multifunction type in-home care, in-home long-term care management, and day care services; daily-life care services for the elderly with dementia; and personnel dispatch, outsourcing, and software services, as well as assisted living facilities. It also engages in the home renovation business; sale and rental of social welfare equipment; and care robot and other businesses. Saint-Care Holding Corporation was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Care Twentyone Corporation provides nursing care services in Japan. The company offers home-visit care, paid nursing home, dementia group home, home care support, small-scale multi-functional home care, day service, childcare services, and rents welfare equipment, as well as home renovation business. It operates support projects for people with disabilities; visiting nursing, medical support, and acupuncture visiting massage business; and nursing care qualification acquisition, human resources introduction/dispatch, and life support business. In addition, the company develops land for real estate owners; operates dining facilities and meal delivery services; and employment support for people with disabilities. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

Kakaku.com, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides purchase support, restaurant review, and other services in Japan. It operates Kakaku.com that provides prices, specifications, and user reviews on various products and services, such as computers, home appliances and smartphones, furniture, internet providers, and insurance and loans to help users make informed decisions; and Tabelog.com, a restaurant discovery and reservation service site. The company also operates Kyujin Box, a comprehensive job search service site; Sumaity, a residential real estate website; 4 travel, a travel review and comparison site; Kakaku.com Insurance, a consulting service for insurance selection; Time Design, a dynamic package reservation platform; icotto, an online travel information media; Bus Hikaku Navi, a price comparison service for highway and overnight buses; Tabi Hikaku Navi, a comparison service for domestic tours and travel within Japan, including prices and itineraries; and Kakuyasu Idou, a comparison site for the cheapest bus, airline and bullet train tickets. In addition, it operates Bus Trip, an online media on highway busses and bus tours; Kinarino, a Lifestyle media; LiPLUS, a home service matching platform; PHOTOHITO, a photo sharing community site; webCG, an online media for car enthusiasts; Tabelog Kyujin, a restaurant and foodservice; and Jobcube, a comprehensive job search service site. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

MEDINET Co., Ltd. operates as a contract development and manufacturing organization that provides regenerative medicine and cell therapy solutions in Japan. Its solutions include technical know-how, facilities, systems, materials, professional cell-engineers, and other requirements to conduct immuno-cell therapy. The company also manufactures regenerative medical/investigational and specified cell products. In addition, its value chain solutions comprise personnel training, facility and equipment design, facility operations and management, preparation of standard operating procedures, logistics network, information system, purchasing and production management, quality management system, quality control and assurance, and technology transfer and process development solutions. The company serves medical institutions, research institutions, and biopharmaceutical companies. MEDINET Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

business_summary: Core Corporation provides information and communication technology services in Japan. The company operates through three segments: Future Society Solutions Business, Industrial Technology Solutions Business, and Customer Business Integration Business. The Future Society Solutions Business segment engages in social issues such as the environment and life infrastructure. The Industrial Technology Solutions Business provides customers' business problems using IoT (AI), GNSS, and other technologies; and provides solutions that utilize CT technology. The Customer Business Integration Business segment provides total ICT solutions that utilize business knowledge and know-how for customer business. The company offers solutions to public, medical system, energy, Internet of things, media, space technology, DX insight, cloud service, security measures, manufacturing, and finance sectors. Core Corporation was incorporated in 1969 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

YE DIGITAL Corporation provides Internet of Things (IoT) solutions in Japan. The company operates cloud application service products, such as MMCloud, an IoT platform with data storage, visualization, and analysis; and MMPredict, an AI-based fault prediction engine. It also offers MMsmartMonitor service with wireless cameras and cloud viewer; MMEye that enables real-time image inspection; MMsmartSecurity, a factory security solution for monitoring and status management; Smart Berth System, a berth monitoring system at the logistics facilities; and MMsmart BusStop, a smart bus stop cloud system. In addition, the company provides communication adapters with various communication interfaces, such as MMLink-3G communication adapters; and MMLink-Lite 3G SIM-unlocked USB interface communication adapters. Further, the company offers location aware solutions, precise indoor localization solutions, camera products, controllers, cellular network products, data loggers, programmable HMIs, and remote monitoring software, as well as IoT consulting services. It serves various industries, such as semi-conductor manufacturers, machine tool manufacturers, food manufacturers, temperature controller manufacturers, and others. The company was formerly known as Yaskawa Information Systems Corporation and changed its name to YE DIGITAL Corporation in March 2019. YE DIGITAL Corporation was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Kitakyushu, Japan.

NIPPON PARKING DEVELOPMENT Co.,Ltd. provides consulting services for parking lot in Japan and internationally. The company is involved in the car sharing, parking lot purchase, and parking management operation activities; renting of parking and cars; ski resort information and operation consulting activities; management of health-related facilities; and management of and consultation services for theme parks and amusement parks. It also provides educational services; consulting services for healthy operation and wellness management, as well as related to decarbonization, power sales, and business; and medical checks and health management services. In addition, the company engages in the distribution of medical devices to medical institutions; and development, renting, subleasing, and management of residential and commercial facilities for housing and lodging purposes. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

ASJ Inc. engages in the setting up and management of servers on the Internet in Japan. The company also provides cloud, payment, and internet consulting services, as well as designs and develops computer software and smartphone applications. In addition, the company leases and manages real estate properties. Further, it engages in the planning, production, and management of website; development of smartphone application for iOS and Android; and provision of web shop, logistics, and ERP software services. ASJ Inc. was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Kawaguchi, Japan.
